structure.unit: ADMINISTRATION OF TRUSTS -- LEGAL INVESTMENTS -- UNIFORM PRINCIPAL AND INCOME ACT

law.catch_line: Authorized investments of trust funds -- Fiduciary to account for profits -- Section not applicable to trustees.

text.section: Fiduciaries holding funds for loan or investment may make loans with the securities named in subsection (1) of this section as collateral.
The fiduciary shall account for all interest or profit received.
This section shall not apply to trustees.
